member.name: T:LiquidNun.Logging.TestContext.Provider
member.summary: Logs the specified events to the Test Context. Used to display the results of logging in tests run under MSTest.
member.remarks: Requires the .NET Framework version 4.6 or higher.

member.name: M:LiquidNun.Logging.TestContext.Provider.#ctor(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.TestContext)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the TestContext Logging Provider using the TestContext instance passed into the method.
member.param: The instance of a TestContext object to be logged to.

member.name: M:LiquidNun.Logging.TestContext.Provider.Write(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,LiquidNun.Entities.EventLogEntryType)
member.summary: Writes the log entry into the Test Context
member.param: The application specific category of the log entry.
The title for the log entry. This is usually the 1st thing that will be seen when entries are reviewed.
The full text of the message sent to the logging provider.
An indication of how critical an event the entry represents.
The type of entry as described in the EventLogEntryType enumeration.
